html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-05722018-05-24
ActCompetition Act
PrecisAppointment of MATTHEW F. J. BOSWELL of Ottawa, Ontario, a Deputy Commissioner, to exercise the powers and perform the duties of the Commissioner of Competition on an interim basis, to hold office for a term of one year or until such time as a new Commissioner of Competition is appointed, whichever is earlier, effective May 31, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
